original:
Hey, ^P...

...Two Dorumon went to Magnet
Mine yesterday and didn't return...
I'm worried something might have
happened to them...
Could I trouble you to go look for
them...?
translation:
Hey, ^P...

...Two Dorumon went to Magnet
Mine yesterday and didn't return...
I'm worried something might have
happened to them...
Could I trouble you to go look for
them...?

original:
Two Dorumon went to Magnet 
Mine yesterday and didn't return...
I'm counting on you, ^P.
translation:
Two Dorumon went to Magnet 
Mine yesterday and didn't return...
I'm counting on you, ^P.

original:
I see...
If that's what Hookmon said...
I better give those Dorumon a
thorough lesson when they return!
Thank you very much, ^P.

Please, take this reward.
translation:
I see...
If that's what Hookmon said...
I better give those Dorumon a
thorough lesson when they return!
Thank you very much, ^P.

Please, take this reward.

original:
They're so careless, it's painful
to watch...
Thank you again, ^P.
translation:
They're so careless, it's painful
to watch...
Thank you again, ^P.

original:
Ouch...
I got totally destroyed...
The two of us were walking along, 
then suddenly WHAM! 
I realized I was hit by Hookmon...
They took my big bro away...
Please, save my big bro...
translation:
Ouch...
I got totally destroyed...
The two of us were walking along, 
then suddenly WHAM! 
I realized I was hit by Hookmon...
They took my big bro away...
Please, save my big bro...

original:
Ow...
Please, save my big bro...
translation:
Ow...
Please, save my big bro...

original:
I took Dorumon away?
Pffft, you must be mistaken.
But being accused of something I
didn't do...
It puts me in a bad mood,
and it's all your fault, ya know?
translation:
I took Dorumon away?
Pffft, you must be mistaken.
But being accused of something I
didn't do...
It puts me in a bad mood,
and it's all your fault, ya know?

original:
Hahah, you really are strong!
Alright fine, I'll talk.
Dorumon was knocked out by his
own brother's tail.
And then BAM!
He fell and hit the ground.
All I did was watch the scene 
unfold.
His brother is probably ran off.
He's probably looking for ice.
I wouldn't be concerned, 
I'm sure he'll return soon enough.
Do inform Kamemon about this,
as well.
translation:
Hahah, you really are strong!
Alright fine, I'll talk.
Dorumon was knocked out by his
own brother's tail.
And then BAM!
He fell and hit the ground.
All I did was watch the scene 
unfold.
His brother is probably ran off.
He's probably looking for ice.
I wouldn't be concerned, 
I'm sure he'll return soon enough.
Do inform Kamemon about this,
as well.

original:
Even so, his little brother sure
is a hasty one...
Labelling me as the culprit so
carelessly like that...
translation:
Even so, his little brother sure
is a hasty one...
Labelling me as the culprit so
carelessly like that...

original:
Yo, ^P!
Thanks for coming!
This is kind of random, but
I really looove sap!
But I love the Shocking Sap that
Lalamon makes most of all!
I wanna eat some electrifying
Shocking Sap right now!
So please, ^P!

Go to Chip Forest and get some
Shocking Sap from Lalamon!
translation:
Yo, ^P!
Thanks for coming!
This is kind of random, but
I really looove sap!
But I love the Shocking Sap that
Lalamon makes most of all!
I wanna eat some electrifying
Shocking Sap right now!
So please, ^P!

Go to Chip Forest and get some
Shocking Sap from Lalamon!

original:
Shocking Sap has this simply
electrifying taste to it!
It's incredibly delicious!

Go to Chip Forest and get some
Shocking Sap from Lalamon!
translation:
Shocking Sap has this simply
electrifying taste to it!
It's incredibly delicious!

Go to Chip Forest and get some
Shocking Sap from Lalamon!

original:
There's an incredibly delicious scent
coming from you, ^P!
Wow! Its some Shocking Sap!
You did it! I've got chills!
Thank you, ^P!
Here's my thanks!
translation:
There's an incredibly delicious scent
coming from you, ^P!
Wow! Its some Shocking Sap!
You did it! I've got chills!
Thank you, ^P!
Here's my thanks!

original:
Handed over a Key Item
Shocking Sap
translation:
Handed over a Key Item
Shocking Sap

original: Whoa... E-electrifying...!
translation: Whoa... E-electrifying...!

original:
What do you want from me?

I see... Well if its a request from
Kokuwamon, I simply can't refuse!
But there's one problem...
My old Sap Branch is out of sap.
I know! You can help find me 
another source!
There should be another Sap
Branch around here somewhere!
I'm counting on you!
translation:
What do you want from me?

I see... Well if its a request from
Kokuwamon, I simply can't refuse!
But there's one problem...
My old Sap Branch is out of sap.
I know! You can help find me 
another source!
There should be another Sap
Branch around here somewhere!
I'm counting on you!

original:
There should be another Sap 
Branch in Chip Forest somewhere!
I'm counting on you!
translation:
There should be another Sap 
Branch in Chip Forest somewhere!
I'm counting on you!

original:
Oh, great!
You found a Sap Branch!
With this, I can finally make my 
electrifying Shocking Sap!
............

Here you go! Please pass this to
Kokuwamon for me!
translation:
Oh, great!
You found a Sap Branch!
With this, I can finally make my 
electrifying Shocking Sap!
............

Here you go! Please pass this to
Kokuwamon for me!

original:
Handed over a Key Item
Sap Branch
translation:
Handed over a Key Item
Sap Branch

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Shocking Sap
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Shocking Sap

original:
Let me know if you ever wanna
try this electrifying sensation!
translation:
Let me know if you ever wanna
try this electrifying sensation!

original:
Hey! Quit your dilly-dallying and
get back there, quickly!
translation:
Hey! Quit your dilly-dallying and
get back there, quickly!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Sap Branch
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Sap Branch

original:
^P, what do you think 
about beauty?
They say that there's a shampoo
that allows you to become beautiful.
...Do you understand where I'm
going with this?
Could you search for this so-called
Beauty Shampoo for me?
It's somewhere in Label Forest.
translation:
^P, what do you think 
about beauty?
They say that there's a shampoo
that allows you to become beautiful.
...Do you understand where I'm
going with this?
Could you search for this so-called
Beauty Shampoo for me?
It's somewhere in Label Forest.

original:
This Beauty Shampoo is said to be
able to turn you sleek and beautiful.
Please go look for it in Label Forest
for me.
translation:
This Beauty Shampoo is said to be
able to turn you sleek and beautiful.
Please go look for it in Label Forest
for me.

original:
Is this the Beauty Shampoo?
It has a wonderful scent...
With this, I'll be able to become
sleek and beautiful, too!
Thank you, ^P.

Please take this as a reward for
your efforts.
translation:
Is this the Beauty Shampoo?
It has a wonderful scent...
With this, I'll be able to become
sleek and beautiful, too!
Thank you, ^P.

Please take this as a reward for
your efforts.

original:
Handed over Key Item
Beauty Shampoo
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Beauty Shampoo

original:
Would you like to give it a try, too,
^P?
translation:
Would you like to give it a try, too,
^P?

original:
Hehehe...
With this shampoo, I can...
Hm? What?
What do you want?
This? This is Beauty Shampoo, it
makes you sleek and beautiful!
...Don't tell me you want it, too?

No way! Absolutely not!
I'll never hand it over to you!
translation:
Hehehe...
With this shampoo, I can...
Hm? What?
What do you want?
This? This is Beauty Shampoo, it
makes you sleek and beautiful!
...Don't tell me you want it, too?

No way! Absolutely not!
I'll never hand it over to you!

original:
Grrr! How frustrating! I thought I 
could have it all to myself!
But fine! You win!
I'll give you some, but only a little.
translation:
Grrr! How frustrating! I thought I 
could have it all to myself!
But fine! You win!
I'll give you some, but only a little.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Beauty Shampoo
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Beauty Shampoo

original:
Here! That should be enough, right?
Now leave. I want to try it myself.
translation:
Here! That should be enough, right?
Now leave. I want to try it myself.

original:
Getting so worked up is bad for
my skin!
translation:
Getting so worked up is bad for
my skin!

original:
Are you ^P?
You're a Tamer, correct?
Please help us!
Please protect our home!
There's an Ookuwamon rampaging
about in Login Mountain.
If this keeps going...
Our home will be destroyed!
So please, hurry and stop
Ookuwamon!
translation:
Are you ^P?
You're a Tamer, correct?
Please help us!
Please protect our home!
There's an Ookuwamon rampaging
about in Login Mountain.
If this keeps going...
Our home will be destroyed!
So please, hurry and stop
Ookuwamon!

original:
There's an Ookuwamon rampaging
about in Login Mountain.
If this keeps going...
Our home will be destroyed!
We only just built it, too...
translation:
There's an Ookuwamon rampaging
about in Login Mountain.
If this keeps going...
Our home will be destroyed!
We only just built it, too...

original:
^P!
You stopped Ookuwamon for us.
That one has a tendancy to go on
sudden rampages...
And our home wasn't damaged at 
all! Thank you so much!
Here, please take this as a reward!
translation:
^P!
You stopped Ookuwamon for us.
That one has a tendancy to go on
sudden rampages...
And our home wasn't damaged at 
all! Thank you so much!
Here, please take this as a reward!

original:
Why don't you come visit our
new home someday?
translation:
Why don't you come visit our
new home someday?

original:
I can't control myself!
I'm gonna destroy everything!
translation:
I can't control myself!
I'm gonna destroy everything!

original:
Ugh... Where... am I?
Who are you...?
I see...
I must have lost my memory...
I'm unable to surpress that other
side of myself, sometimes...
Sigh...
All I do is cause trouble...
translation:
Ugh... Where... am I?
Who are you...?
I see...
I must have lost my memory...
I'm unable to surpress that other
side of myself, sometimes...
Sigh...
All I do is cause trouble...

original:
I'm trying to look cool?!
W-what are you going on about?!
This is what I'm actually like...!
translation:
I'm trying to look cool?!
W-what are you going on about?!
This is what I'm actually like...!

original:
My name is Birdramon,
and I have a rival.
It's Aquilamon from 
Login Mountain.
I'm in the middle of training, but 
still have a long way to go...
I want to find out just how strong
Aquilamon has become right now.
In other words, I'd like you to 
challenge them to a fight for me.
translation:
My name is Birdramon,
and I have a rival.
It's Aquilamon from 
Login Mountain.
I'm in the middle of training, but 
still have a long way to go...
I want to find out just how strong
Aquilamon has become right now.
In other words, I'd like you to 
challenge them to a fight for me.

original:
Login Mountain is a great place
to train.
I bet Aquilamon's gotten pretty
strong by now...
In other words, I'd like you to 
challenge them to a fight for me.
translation:
Login Mountain is a great place
to train.
I bet Aquilamon's gotten pretty
strong by now...
In other words, I'd like you to 
challenge them to a fight for me.

original:
I see...
Aquilamon's gotten stronger...
I will accept this proof of our 
promise.
In other words, I won't lose...

Here's your reward.
I'm grateful for your assistance.
translation:
I see...
Aquilamon's gotten stronger...
I will accept this proof of our 
promise.
In other words, I won't lose...

Here's your reward.
I'm grateful for your assistance.

original:
Handed over Key Item
Friendship Medal
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Friendship Medal

original:
I suggest you train yourself up,
too. Until we meet again.
translation:
I suggest you train yourself up,
too. Until we meet again.

original:
I see...
You're looking to challenge me, huh?
In that case, let's see what you've
got!
translation:
I see...
You're looking to challenge me, huh?
In that case, let's see what you've
got!

original:
Birdramon sure picked the right
person for the job.
Which means they've probably
gotten quite strong, themself.
Here, take this.
translation:
Birdramon sure picked the right
person for the job.
Which means they've probably
gotten quite strong, themself.
Here, take this.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Friendship Medal
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Friendship Medal

original:
Pass this onto Birdramon.
It's a symbol of our promise.
Our promise to have a match again
next time we meet.
translation:
Pass this onto Birdramon.
It's a symbol of our promise.
Our promise to have a match again
next time we meet.

original:
You're strong...
And I'm not just saying that.
translation:
You're strong...
And I'm not just saying that.

original:
Hey, ^P! Hear me out!
I'm starving!
I heard that eating a single Golden
Apple,
From Pixel Desert will totally fill you
up!
I really, REALLY wanna eat one!
Go get one for me! 
You can ask Tentomon for the 
details!
translation:
Hey, ^P! Hear me out!
I'm starving!
I heard that eating a single Golden
Apple,
From Pixel Desert will totally fill you
up!
I really, REALLY wanna eat one!
Go get one for me! 
You can ask Tentomon for the 
details!

original:
I'm absolutely famished!
Hurry and get that Golden Apple!
Tentomon's in Pixel Desert!
Go find and ask them about it!
translation:
I'm absolutely famished!
Hurry and get that Golden Apple!
Tentomon's in Pixel Desert!
Go find and ask them about it!

original:
Whoa!
It's a Golden Apple!
Thank you, ^P!

This apple sure weighs a ton!

I can't wait to dig in!
Oh, but before that,
Here's your reward!
translation:
Whoa!
It's a Golden Apple!
Thank you, ^P!

This apple sure weighs a ton!

I can't wait to dig in!
Oh, but before that,
Here's your reward!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Golden Apple
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Golden Apple

original:
Hmm?!
What the-?!
This thing's too hard! I can't eat it?!

No, I can do it!
I just need more willpower!
translation:
Hmm?!
What the-?!
This thing's too hard! I can't eat it?!

No, I can do it!
I just need more willpower!

original:
A Golden Apple?
Are you sure that's edible??
It's probably covered in sand right
now, no one would eat that.
But I can clean it up with this 
Golden Brush I have here.
Come back once you've found
a Golden Apple.
translation:
A Golden Apple?
Are you sure that's edible??
It's probably covered in sand right
now, no one would eat that.
But I can clean it up with this 
Golden Brush I have here.
Come back once you've found
a Golden Apple.

original:
I'll polish up that Golden Apple once
you've found it,
So come back here after you have.
translation:
I'll polish up that Golden Apple once
you've found it,
So come back here after you have.

original:
Oh, you've found a Golden Apple.
Then let us begin.
............

Aaand done. Thank you for bringing
it to me.
Oh, that's right...
I won't stop you from eating it, but
I suggest you prepare some 
stomach medicine before you do.
translation:
Oh, you've found a Golden Apple.
Then let us begin.
............

Aaand done. Thank you for bringing
it to me.
Oh, that's right...
I won't stop you from eating it, but
I suggest you prepare some 
stomach medicine before you do.

original:
It is indeed a beautiful fruit,
but...
translation:
It is indeed a beautiful fruit,
but...

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Golden Apple
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Golden Apple

original:
I have a request for you,
^P...
I want... to be brave...

Apparently you can obtain the 
Proof of Courage
by winning a tournament being
held in Shadow Hell.
You can get the Proof of Courage
by gathering the four fragments.
So... could you please help me 
collect the Courage Pieces?!
I'll go on ahead and wait for you
at Shadow Hell.
translation:
I have a request for you,
^P...
I want... to be brave...

Apparently you can obtain the 
Proof of Courage
by winning a tournament being
held in Shadow Hell.
You can get the Proof of Courage
by gathering the four fragments.
So... could you please help me 
collect the Courage Pieces?!
I'll go on ahead and wait for you
at Shadow Hell.

original:
Please head to Shadow Hell.
We'll meet up over there.
translation:
Please head to Shadow Hell.
We'll meet up over there.

original:
Welcome back!

Look! Look! 
I managed to get a piece, too!
Now we'll just put it together with
the pieces you collected, and...
translation:
Welcome back!

Look! Look! 
I managed to get a piece, too!
Now we'll just put it together with
the pieces you collected, and...

original:
Handed over Key Item
Courage Piece B
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Courage Piece B

original:
Handed over Key Item
Courage Piece C
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Courage Piece C

original:
Handed over Key Item
Courage Piece D
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Courage Piece D

original:
There!

It's done!
The Proof of Courage!
Now everything should go well
so long as I have this...!
Hm?
What will go well...?
T-that's a secret...

But if things do go well, it's all
thanks to you, ^P.
Thank you! 
Here's your reward!
translation:
There!

It's done!
The Proof of Courage!
Now everything should go well
so long as I have this...!
Hm?
What will go well...?
T-that's a secret...

But if things do go well, it's all
thanks to you, ^P.
Thank you! 
Here's your reward!

original:
You're really strong, ^P!

It'd be good if you could take part
in another tournament someday.
translation:
You're really strong, ^P!

It'd be good if you could take part
in another tournament someday.

original:
Each Digimon in this area currently 
holds a Courage Piece.
Please go and gather up three of
the Pieces, ^P...!
I'll also do my best to get a piece!
I'll fight with all my might!
Once we've gathered the pieces,
let's meet back up at the DigiBase.
It's a promise!
Let's both give it our all!
translation:
Each Digimon in this area currently 
holds a Courage Piece.
Please go and gather up three of
the Pieces, ^P...!
I'll also do my best to get a piece!
I'll fight with all my might!
Once we've gathered the pieces,
let's meet back up at the DigiBase.
It's a promise!
Let's both give it our all!

original:
The Digimon carrying pieces are
somewhere in Shadow Hell.
Please collect three pieces for me,
^P.
translation:
The Digimon carrying pieces are
somewhere in Shadow Hell.
Please collect three pieces for me,
^P.

original:
You're a participant in this 
tournament, eh? Interesting...
I'll give you this piece...
If you can beat me!
translation:
You're a participant in this 
tournament, eh? Interesting...
I'll give you this piece...
If you can beat me!

original:
You're strong... Worthy of holding
the Proof of Courage.
Here's my piece, as promised.
translation:
You're strong... Worthy of holding
the Proof of Courage.
Here's my piece, as promised.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Courage Piece B
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Courage Piece B

original:
Once you've collected all four pieces
they'll form the Proof of Courage.
Good luck.
translation:
Once you've collected all four pieces
they'll form the Proof of Courage.
Good luck.

original:
Once you've collected all four pieces
they'll form the Proof of Courage.
Good luck.
translation:
Once you've collected all four pieces
they'll form the Proof of Courage.
Good luck.

original:
You wish to obtain this piece that
I possess?
Then you'll have to beat me...!
translation:
You wish to obtain this piece that
I possess?
Then you'll have to beat me...!

original:
You have done well.
Here, take this piece, as promised.
translation:
You have done well.
Here, take this piece, as promised.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Courage Piece C
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Courage Piece C

original:
This is but a mere fragment,
you'll need to gather more.
translation:
This is but a mere fragment,
you'll need to gather more.

original:
This is but a mere fragment,
you'll need to gather more.
translation:
This is but a mere fragment,
you'll need to gather more.

original:
I'm super strong, ya know!
Let's bet a piece on our match!
translation:
I'm super strong, ya know!
Let's bet a piece on our match!

original:
Awesome fight!
I expected no less from you!
Here ya go, a Courage Piece!
translation:
Awesome fight!
I expected no less from you!
Here ya go, a Courage Piece!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Courage Piece D
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Courage Piece D

original:
You'll need four Courage Pieces to
make the Proof of Courage, got it!?
translation:
You'll need four Courage Pieces to
make the Proof of Courage, got it!?

original:
You'll need four Courage Pieces to
make the Proof of Courage, got it!?
translation:
You'll need four Courage Pieces to
make the Proof of Courage, got it!?

original:
Hey, ^P, 
I've got a bit of a problem.
Dracmon's out playing pranks again
and causing trouble for everyone.
They even went and doodled 
something on my back, yesterday!
It seems like Dracmon's after 
something, though...
Could you go to Palette Amazon and
take a look? Be careful, though!
translation:
Hey, ^P, 
I've got a bit of a problem.
Dracmon's out playing pranks again
and causing trouble for everyone.
They even went and doodled 
something on my back, yesterday!
It seems like Dracmon's after 
something, though...
Could you go to Palette Amazon and
take a look? Be careful, though!

original:
Dracmon wrote 'idiot' on my back
the other day...
It was a real pain, since it won't
come off easy...
Anyway, Dracmon's in Palette
Amazon, go find them for me.
translation:
Dracmon wrote 'idiot' on my back
the other day...
It was a real pain, since it won't
come off easy...
Anyway, Dracmon's in Palette
Amazon, go find them for me.

original:
I see...
So Dracmon wanted to Digivolve.
In that case, they could have asked
you for help, ^P!
But looks like Dracmon won't be
causing trouble for a while.
And to top it off, my back's finally
all clean!
Thank you, ^P!
Here's your reward.
translation:
I see...
So Dracmon wanted to Digivolve.
In that case, they could have asked
you for help, ^P!
But looks like Dracmon won't be
causing trouble for a while.
And to top it off, my back's finally
all clean!
Thank you, ^P!
Here's your reward.

original:
Please keep an eye on Dracmon in
case they stir up trouble again.
translation:
Please keep an eye on Dracmon in
case they stir up trouble again.

original:
W-what... What's this?
Ugh! Not you again!
I didn't do anything this time, so
leave me alone, okay?!
...Come to think of it, you're a 
Tamer, aren't you?
...That's it!

I've got a request for ya! If you
help out, I'll stop playing pranks.
I'm after a Purple Stone!

W-what? What's that?
I'm not plotting anything, okay?!
You're a Tamer, aren't you?
Hurry and go get that Stone!
translation:
W-what... What's this?
Ugh! Not you again!
I didn't do anything this time, so
leave me alone, okay?!
...Come to think of it, you're a 
Tamer, aren't you?
...That's it!

I've got a request for ya! If you
help out, I'll stop playing pranks.
I'm after a Purple Stone!

W-what? What's that?
I'm not plotting anything, okay?!
You're a Tamer, aren't you?
Hurry and go get that Stone!

original:
If you bring me that Stone, I'll quit
playing pranks on everyone.
The Stone should be somewhere
in Palette Amazon!
A more exact location...?
As if I know! Go look yourself!
translation:
If you bring me that Stone, I'll quit
playing pranks on everyone.
The Stone should be somewhere
in Palette Amazon!
A more exact location...?
As if I know! Go look yourself!

original:
That's a Purple Stone, isn't it?!
Hurry and hand it over!
translation:
That's a Purple Stone, isn't it?!
Hurry and hand it over!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Purple Stone
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Purple Stone

original:
So this is a Purple Stone...!

With this, I can finally Digivolve!

What? What's that? 

You didn't know about this, 
despite being a Tamer??
With this, I'll be able to Digivolve
into the strongest Digimon ever!
You didn't know that, either?
What are you, stupid??
...What?
Evolution Tree? DigiPlate??
What? What's that??
You never told me about that!
You tricked me!
You're in for it, now!
translation:
So this is a Purple Stone...!

With this, I can finally Digivolve!

What? What's that? 

You didn't know about this, 
despite being a Tamer??
With this, I'll be able to Digivolve
into the strongest Digimon ever!
You didn't know that, either?
What are you, stupid??
...What?
Evolution Tree? DigiPlate??
What? What's that??
You never told me about that!
You tricked me!
You're in for it, now!

original:
If I could just...
If I could just... Digivolve...
Then I'd be able to crush you to
dust like it was nothing!
You idiot!
I'm not gonna stop my pranks!
Now get lost!
Or I'll bite you! Chomp chomp!
translation:
If I could just...
If I could just... Digivolve...
Then I'd be able to crush you to
dust like it was nothing!
You idiot!
I'm not gonna stop my pranks!
Now get lost!
Or I'll bite you! Chomp chomp!

original:
I won't be tricked by you again!
Just get lost, already!
translation:
I won't be tricked by you again!
Just get lost, already!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Purple Stone
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Purple Stone

original:
^P!
I have a request for you!
I have a new medicine I'd like to
test out.
But everyone runs away at the 
mere sight of me...
So could I ask you to help test
the medicine in my stead?
I'll give you three samples to 
distribute in Register Jungle.
I'm counting on you.
translation:
^P!
I have a request for you!
I have a new medicine I'd like to
test out.
But everyone runs away at the 
mere sight of me...
So could I ask you to help test
the medicine in my stead?
I'll give you three samples to 
distribute in Register Jungle.
I'm counting on you.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Suspicious Medicine A
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Suspicious Medicine A

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Suspicious Medicine B
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Suspicious Medicine B

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Suspicious Medicine C
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Suspicious Medicine C

original:
It's delicious! It's healthy!
You'll be invigorated with one sip!
That's all you've gotta say.

You've got absolutely nothing to
worry about.
translation:
It's delicious! It's healthy!
You'll be invigorated with one sip!
That's all you've gotta say.

You've got absolutely nothing to
worry about.

original:
I see you distributed all three 
samples, thank you!
Hm? What kind of medicine is it...?

.........That's a secret!

Don't worry about it! Really!
It's totally fiiine!
Here's your reward!
translation:
I see you distributed all three 
samples, thank you!
Hm? What kind of medicine is it...?

.........That's a secret!

Don't worry about it! Really!
It's totally fiiine!
Here's your reward!

original:
Don't worry about it!
It's totally fine!
translation:
Don't worry about it!
It's totally fine!

original:
Oh, ^P!
What's up?
What a strong scent... What's 
that? Some sort of medicine?
You're giving it to me?
Wow! Thanks!
I bet it's some incredible medicine!
I'll try it once I get back!
translation:
Oh, ^P!
What's up?
What a strong scent... What's 
that? Some sort of medicine?
You're giving it to me?
Wow! Thanks!
I bet it's some incredible medicine!
I'll try it once I get back!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Suspicious Medicine A
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Suspicious Medicine A

original: I trust you, after all!
translation: I trust you, after all!

original:
Hey, ^P,
...You're giving this to me?
It's got a very... vibrant color...
Not to mention the smell...
But if you're the one giving it to
me, ^P...
It must be good medicine.
Thank you for this!
translation:
Hey, ^P,
...You're giving this to me?
It's got a very... vibrant color...
Not to mention the smell...
But if you're the one giving it to
me, ^P...
It must be good medicine.
Thank you for this!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Suspicious Medicine B
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Suspicious Medicine B

original:
Once I get back, I'll be sure to 
try it right away!
translation:
Once I get back, I'll be sure to 
try it right away!

original:
^P!
Whoa! Something stinks!
Huh? It's medicine??
But it stinks so bad!
Hmmm... But if you're giving it to
me, I guess I'll accept it.
translation:
^P!
Whoa! Something stinks!
Huh? It's medicine??
But it stinks so bad!
Hmmm... But if you're giving it to
me, I guess I'll accept it.

original:
Handed over Key Item
Suspicious Medicine C
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Suspicious Medicine C

original:
Well, since you gave it to me,
^P, I'm sure its good.
translation:
Well, since you gave it to me,
^P, I'm sure its good.

original:
Uwah! ^P!
I'm in big trouble, here!
I totally overslept and missed
Yatagaramon's training!
Yatagaramon's super scary when
they get mad!
So scary you end up completely
speechless!
And I hate not being able to 
speak!
Could you go to Login Mountain
and see if they're mad at me?
Please!
translation:
Uwah! ^P!
I'm in big trouble, here!
I totally overslept and missed
Yatagaramon's training!
Yatagaramon's super scary when
they get mad!
So scary you end up completely
speechless!
And I hate not being able to 
speak!
Could you go to Login Mountain
and see if they're mad at me?
Please!

original:
I can't speak to Yatagaramon 
when they get angry!
I hate not speaking so much, 
I could die!
Please go to Login Mountan and
check if Yatagaramon is angry...!
translation:
I can't speak to Yatagaramon 
when they get angry!
I hate not speaking so much, 
I could die!
Please go to Login Mountan and
check if Yatagaramon is angry...!

original:
T-that's...!
A DigiPower X!?
Whoa! I'm touched!
Yatagaramon's such a great guy!
Our friendship will never die!
For all eternity!
Thank you, ^P!
Here, your reward!
translation:
T-that's...!
A DigiPower X!?
Whoa! I'm touched!
Yatagaramon's such a great guy!
Our friendship will never die!
For all eternity!
Thank you, ^P!
Here, your reward!

original:
Handed over Key Item
DigiPower X
translation:
Handed over Key Item
DigiPower X

original:
I'll be sure to set an alarm
next time!
Why don't you join us for training
someday, too, ^P!
translation:
I'll be sure to set an alarm
next time!
Why don't you join us for training
someday, too, ^P!

original:
The DigiPower X... Is in a treasure
box somewhere on this mountain...
...Bring it to me.
translation:
The DigiPower X... Is in a treasure
box somewhere on this mountain...
...Bring it to me.

original:
^P...
I have a problem...
Umm... I lost my tails...

Umm... I dropped two of them...

I think I dropped them when I went
to Register Jungle...
Could you please go find them?
translation:
^P...
I have a problem...
Umm... I lost my tails...

Umm... I dropped two of them...

I think I dropped them when I went
to Register Jungle...
Could you please go find them?

original:
Even I get a little careless,
sometimes...
Please find my two tails in
Register Jungle.
translation:
Even I get a little careless,
sometimes...
Please find my two tails in
Register Jungle.

original:
Oh, ^P!
I found my tails!
Looks like they were just hidden
behind my other tails.
I thought it was weird that I could
have just lost my tails like that!
...Huh? You also found some
tails, ^P...?
Um...

Then I guess I'll offer you my
thanks, anyway...
Anyway, thank you very much.
This is for the trouble.
translation:
Oh, ^P!
I found my tails!
Looks like they were just hidden
behind my other tails.
I thought it was weird that I could
have just lost my tails like that!
...Huh? You also found some
tails, ^P...?
Um...

Then I guess I'll offer you my
thanks, anyway...
Anyway, thank you very much.
This is for the trouble.

original:
Handed over Key Item
Kyuubi Tail A
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Kyuubi Tail A

original:
Handed over Key Item
Kyuubi Tail B
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Kyuubi Tail B

original: I wonder whose tails these are...
translation: I wonder whose tails these are...

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Kyuubi Tail A
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Kyuubi Tail A

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Kyuubi Tail B
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Kyuubi Tail B

original:
Grrrr! ^P!
I'm so angry right now!
Matadormon stole my Caterpillar
Track!
Thanks to that, now I can't move!

Please help me get my Caterpillar
Track back!
Matadormon is at Pixel Desert!
translation:
Grrrr! ^P!
I'm so angry right now!
Matadormon stole my Caterpillar
Track!
Thanks to that, now I can't move!

Please help me get my Caterpillar
Track back!
Matadormon is at Pixel Desert!

original:
Feet! If only I had feet!
Grrr...! I can't move...!
I can't do my training!
Please go to Pixel Desert!
translation:
Feet! If only I had feet!
Grrr...! I can't move...!
I can't do my training!
Please go to Pixel Desert!

original:
Grrr! It's my Caterpillar Track!
Thanks, ^P!
With this, now I can finally get to
my training!
Yahoo!
Here, take this reward!
translation:
Grrr! It's my Caterpillar Track!
Thanks, ^P!
With this, now I can finally get to
my training!
Yahoo!
Here, take this reward!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Caterpillar Track
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Caterpillar Track

original:
Grrr! It's easy to move again,
just like before!
translation:
Grrr! It's easy to move again,
just like before!

original:
Tankmon's Caterpillar Track?
Beats me, I have no clue.
I stole it, you say?
Oh-ho, you've misunderstood.
...Now that you mention it.

I remember seeing Tyilinmon holding
something like that.
Why don't you try asking them?
translation:
Tankmon's Caterpillar Track?
Beats me, I have no clue.
I stole it, you say?
Oh-ho, you've misunderstood.
...Now that you mention it.

I remember seeing Tyilinmon holding
something like that.
Why don't you try asking them?

original:
I saw Tyilinmon heading further
into the desert.
translation:
I saw Tyilinmon heading further
into the desert.

original:
Oh-ho, did Tyilinmon lose to you?

How boring...
Tyilinmon is so useless...
Do you get it, now?

I was the one who took the 
Caterpillar Track.
Because I just love basking
in others' misfortune!
And that's why I want to see you
getting into more trouble!
translation:
Oh-ho, did Tyilinmon lose to you?

How boring...
Tyilinmon is so useless...
Do you get it, now?

I was the one who took the 
Caterpillar Track.
Because I just love basking
in others' misfortune!
And that's why I want to see you
getting into more trouble!

original:
For me to lose...
To someone like this...
Your uncaring face just doesn't
suit my taste...
Hmph.

Fine then, take your dirty
Caterpillar Track!
translation:
For me to lose...
To someone like this...
Your uncaring face just doesn't
suit my taste...
Hmph.

Fine then, take your dirty
Caterpillar Track!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Caterpillar Track
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Caterpillar Track

original:
Hmph.
Hurry and take it away.
translation:
Hmph.
Hurry and take it away.

original:
That carefree expression...!
Grrr! So annoying!
translation:
That carefree expression...!
Grrr! So annoying!

original:
Caterpillar Track?
You think I have it?
How dare you?!
Are you insulting me?!
If thats your goal here...
Then we have no choice 
but to fight!
translation:
Caterpillar Track?
You think I have it?
How dare you?!
Are you insulting me?!
If thats your goal here...
Then we have no choice 
but to fight!

original:
You didn't intend to accuse me as
the culprit...?
Oh yeah, you did mention hearing
about it from Matadormon...
You gotta be more careful, 
that one's lying.
I'm sure they know something, 
go and see what they have to say.
translation:
You didn't intend to accuse me as
the culprit...?
Oh yeah, you did mention hearing
about it from Matadormon...
You gotta be more careful, 
that one's lying.
I'm sure they know something, 
go and see what they have to say.

original:
Matadormon is clearly lying. Go 
see what they have to say.
translation:
Matadormon is clearly lying. Go 
see what they have to say.

original:
^P
Sorry, but I have a request for you.
My hobby is making hats,
but...
I was thinking I'd like to set up
my own shop, soon...
But I don't have enough materials
to make more hats,
So could you please find a Crest
Feather and Silk Cloth?
They should be in Limit Valley.
translation:
^P
Sorry, but I have a request for you.
My hobby is making hats,
but...
I was thinking I'd like to set up
my own shop, soon...
But I don't have enough materials
to make more hats,
So could you please find a Crest
Feather and Silk Cloth?
They should be in Limit Valley.

original:
Hobbies vary from person to 
person...
You can find a Crest Feather and
Silk Cloth in Limit Valley.
translation:
Hobbies vary from person to 
person...
You can find a Crest Feather and
Silk Cloth in Limit Valley.

original:
Thank you for finding a Crest
Feather and Silk Cloth.
With these, I can make some nice
hats. You can try one on later!
It's be great if you could come
take a look when I'm done!
Here are some rewards, please
take them.
translation:
Thank you for finding a Crest
Feather and Silk Cloth.
With these, I can make some nice
hats. You can try one on later!
It's be great if you could come
take a look when I'm done!
Here are some rewards, please
take them.

original:
Handed over Key Item.
Crest Feather
translation:
Handed over Key Item.
Crest Feather

original:
Handed over Key Item.
Silk Cloth
translation:
Handed over Key Item.
Silk Cloth

original: I'll make a hat that suits you well!
translation: I'll make a hat that suits you well!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Crest Feather
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Crest Feather

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Silk Cloth
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Silk Cloth

original:
^P! You're late!
I've been waiting forever!
Well you see, I've been catching
colds a lot lately,
So I want to drink more hot drinks!

You know? Like the bubbling Lava
Juice at Shadow Hell!
Of course, you'll get it for me, right?
Please??
translation:
^P! You're late!
I've been waiting forever!
Well you see, I've been catching
colds a lot lately,
So I want to drink more hot drinks!

You know? Like the bubbling Lava
Juice at Shadow Hell!
Of course, you'll get it for me, right?
Please??

original:
I'm telling you, it's the Lava Juice
from Shadow Hell!
Quit asking me so much, okay!
translation:
I'm telling you, it's the Lava Juice
from Shadow Hell!
Quit asking me so much, okay!

original:
This is the Lava Juice! Once glance
tells me it looks pretty hot!
Once I drink this, my cold will
completely disappear!
Thank you, ^P!
I see you in a different light, now!
Here, I'll even give you a reward!
translation:
This is the Lava Juice! Once glance
tells me it looks pretty hot!
Once I drink this, my cold will
completely disappear!
Thank you, ^P!
I see you in a different light, now!
Here, I'll even give you a reward!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Lava Juice
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Lava Juice

original:
!!!
This is hot!
translation:
!!!
This is hot!

original:
Hey, you!

This Lava Juice is mine!

If you want it, you can have it...
Once you defeat me!
Hah haaah!
translation:
Hey, you!

This Lava Juice is mine!

If you want it, you can have it...
Once you defeat me!
Hah haaah!

original:
Whoa! Damn!
I lost!
Fine! I'll keep my promise!
Take it!
translation:
Whoa! Damn!
I lost!
Fine! I'll keep my promise!
Take it!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Lava Juice
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Lava Juice

original:
Nice fight!
Let's have another bout someday!
translation:
Nice fight!
Let's have another bout someday!

original:
I'll just continue my wandering!
Hah haaah!
translation:
I'll just continue my wandering!
Hah haaah!

original:
Hey, ^P.
Do you think I've gotten fat?
It's true though! I'm about three
times my old weight!
In any case, this is bad... so...
I've decided to go on a diet!
And you, ^P, are gonna
help me out with it!
You see, there's a Diet Fruit at
Palace Laboratory.
Go fetch that for me!

I'm relying on you!
translation:
Hey, ^P.
Do you think I've gotten fat?
It's true though! I'm about three
times my old weight!
In any case, this is bad... so...
I've decided to go on a diet!
And you, ^P, are gonna
help me out with it!
You see, there's a Diet Fruit at
Palace Laboratory.
Go fetch that for me!

I'm relying on you!

original:
While I continue training, go get me
that Diet Fruit in Palace Laboratory!
translation:
While I continue training, go get me
that Diet Fruit in Palace Laboratory!

original:
Oh! W-welcome back,
^P!
W-what, it's not like I was 
sneaking snacks or anything...!
Alllright! I better get back to 
training, breaks over!
Not because I ate any snacks,
though, got it?!
A-anyway... Thanks!
Here's your reward!
translation:
Oh! W-welcome back,
^P!
W-what, it's not like I was 
sneaking snacks or anything...!
Alllright! I better get back to 
training, breaks over!
Not because I ate any snacks,
though, got it?!
A-anyway... Thanks!
Here's your reward!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Diet Fruit
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Diet Fruit

original:
Okay! I'm gonna train!
...I'll do it right now...!
translation:
Okay! I'm gonna train!
...I'll do it right now...!

original:
Ughhh... I got careless and my
weight increased about four times.
But so long as I have this Diet Fruit
I can do it...!
What is it? What do you want?
This Diet Fruit...?
I can share it with you, but...
...Oh, I know!
Keep me company for a bit!
I wanna get some exercise!
If you win, I'll give you this fruit!

Here I come!
translation:
Ughhh... I got careless and my
weight increased about four times.
But so long as I have this Diet Fruit
I can do it...!
What is it? What do you want?
This Diet Fruit...?
I can share it with you, but...
...Oh, I know!
Keep me company for a bit!
I wanna get some exercise!
If you win, I'll give you this fruit!

Here I come!

original:
Phew...
That was some good exercise!
Thanks for keeping me company!
Here's the fruit, as promised.
translation:
Phew...
That was some good exercise!
Thanks for keeping me company!
Here's the fruit, as promised.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Diet Fruit
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Diet Fruit

original:
A proper diet consists of good
meals and exercise!
But before that... is not 
quadrupling in weight...
translation:
A proper diet consists of good
meals and exercise!
But before that... is not 
quadrupling in weight...

original:
I wonder, will I lose a bit of weight
if I use this? ... I'm hungry...
translation:
I wonder, will I lose a bit of weight
if I use this? ... I'm hungry...

original:
I've been waiting for you,
there's someting I'd like to discuss
My friend Deputymon is looking for
a special training partner, but...
Despite our searching, we have yet
to find anyone...
I'd like to train with them, but I 
have an errand to run...
So could you train with Deputymon
in my place?
Deputymon is currently training
in Limit Valley.
I'm counting on you!
translation:
I've been waiting for you,
there's someting I'd like to discuss
My friend Deputymon is looking for
a special training partner, but...
Despite our searching, we have yet
to find anyone...
I'd like to train with them, but I 
have an errand to run...
So could you train with Deputymon
in my place?
Deputymon is currently training
in Limit Valley.
I'm counting on you!

original:
Deputymon special training is tough,
so good luck!
Deputymon is currently in the
middle of training at Limit Valley.
translation:
Deputymon special training is tough,
so good luck!
Deputymon is currently in the
middle of training at Limit Valley.

original:
I see, so Deputymon was 
satisfied, huh...?
I must thank you, ^P,
you did a great job.
If anything else comes up, I'll be
sure to seek your help again.
Here's your reward, as promised.
translation:
I see, so Deputymon was 
satisfied, huh...?
I must thank you, ^P,
you did a great job.
If anything else comes up, I'll be
sure to seek your help again.
Here's your reward, as promised.

original:
I ought to undergo special training
and improve, myself...
translation:
I ought to undergo special training
and improve, myself...

original:
I am Deputymon!
I'm in the midst of training!
Are you the training partner that
Ninjamon told me about?
Got it! It may be a casual match,
but let's do this!
translation:
I am Deputymon!
I'm in the midst of training!
Are you the training partner that
Ninjamon told me about?
Got it! It may be a casual match,
but let's do this!

original:
Phew! I'm finally all warmed up!

Okay, let's go one more round,
please!
translation:
Phew! I'm finally all warmed up!

Okay, let's go one more round,
please!

original:
Thank you very much!
You really are great!
Actually... I'd really like to go one 
more round against you... 
No, no, I better stop now!

When I get stronger, I'll ask for 
your help again!
Send my regards to Ninjamon, too!
translation:
Thank you very much!
You really are great!
Actually... I'd really like to go one 
more round against you... 
No, no, I better stop now!

When I get stronger, I'll ask for 
your help again!
Send my regards to Ninjamon, too!

original: I want to push my limits!
translation: I want to push my limits!

original:
Hey, ^P! Listen to this!

I met someone!

He's attractive and wonderful!
I've fallen head over heels!
I'm sure he's interested in me, too!
After all, our eyes met!
He lives at Wizard Temple! 
Isn't that wonderful?
Please go and tell him about 
my feelings for him!
I'll follow after you, later!
translation:
Hey, ^P! Listen to this!

I met someone!

He's attractive and wonderful!
I've fallen head over heels!
I'm sure he's interested in me, too!
After all, our eyes met!
He lives at Wizard Temple! 
Isn't that wonderful?
Please go and tell him about 
my feelings for him!
I'll follow after you, later!

original:
Go and meet him at Wizard Temple!
Please! 
For the sake of my happiness!
translation:
Go and meet him at Wizard Temple!
Please! 
For the sake of my happiness!

original:
Aha, I'm really sorry.
I'll be more careful next time.
But I'm glad you were there for me
^P!
This is a token of my gratitude.
translation:
Aha, I'm really sorry.
I'll be more careful next time.
But I'm glad you were there for me
^P!
This is a token of my gratitude.

original:
Maybe now I...
^P... I...
No, nevermind, it's nothing.
I'll come visit you again someday!
translation:
Maybe now I...
^P... I...
No, nevermind, it's nothing.
I'll come visit you again someday!

original:
What? A lady wants to go on a
date with me?
...Is it LadyDevimon...?

Hm... Well you see, lately strange 
things have been happening...
My stuff has gone missing...
I've received blank letters...
So, because of that, I'd like to
hold off on any dating.
Please tell her that my reply
is 'No'.
translation:
What? A lady wants to go on a
date with me?
...Is it LadyDevimon...?

Hm... Well you see, lately strange 
things have been happening...
My stuff has gone missing...
I've received blank letters...
So, because of that, I'd like to
hold off on any dating.
Please tell her that my reply
is 'No'.

original:
Is it you...?
I've felt your gaze for quite a while.
Such an intense gaze...
Ugh... It gives me the chills...
translation:
Is it you...?
I've felt your gaze for quite a while.
Such an intense gaze...
Ugh... It gives me the chills...

original:
T-that was a scary event...
My sympathies to you, too...
LadyDevimon went on ahead
back to the DigiBase...
translation:
T-that was a scary event...
My sympathies to you, too...
LadyDevimon went on ahead
back to the DigiBase...

original:
^P!
I'm in trouble, zansu!
I wrote down a secret onto a
scroll, zansu...
I planned to use that to train with
Shurimon in order to make delici...-
I mean, in order to become
stronger, zansu.
But Piedmon stole the scroll, 
zansu!
Shurimon is in Angler Tunnel, so
please go listen to them.
Then take back that scroll for
us, zansu!
translation:
^P!
I'm in trouble, zansu!
I wrote down a secret onto a
scroll, zansu...
I planned to use that to train with
Shurimon in order to make delici...-
I mean, in order to become
stronger, zansu.
But Piedmon stole the scroll, 
zansu!
Shurimon is in Angler Tunnel, so
please go listen to them.
Then take back that scroll for
us, zansu!

original:
Listen to what Shurimon has to say
about Piedmon at Angler Tunnel.
I'm counting on you, zansu!
translation:
Listen to what Shurimon has to say
about Piedmon at Angler Tunnel.
I'm counting on you, zansu!

original:
You got the scroll back, zansu?!
Really, zansu?!
I'm so glad!

With this, we can continue our
cooking training, zansu!
Thank you so very much,
^P, zansu!
Here is your reward, 
as promised, zansu.
translation:
You got the scroll back, zansu?!
Really, zansu?!
I'm so glad!

With this, we can continue our
cooking training, zansu!
Thank you so very much,
^P, zansu!
Here is your reward, 
as promised, zansu.

original:
Come try our food when we're
cooking next time, zansu.
Together with Shurimon, we'll 
keep getting better, zansu!
translation:
Come try our food when we're
cooking next time, zansu.
Together with Shurimon, we'll 
keep getting better, zansu!

original:
Wait, wait!
What's up with that one?
Stealing our precious recipe...-

...I mean, our special scroll for
training purposes!
Piedmon headed further inside!

Get the recipe...- I mean scroll,
And give it to me when you get it!
translation:
Wait, wait!
What's up with that one?
Stealing our precious recipe...-

...I mean, our special scroll for
training purposes!
Piedmon headed further inside!

Get the recipe...- I mean scroll,
And give it to me when you get it!

original:
Piedmon went deeper into the 
tunnel.
When you get the scroll back,
bring it to me, first!
Absolutely do not read the scroll!
translation:
Piedmon went deeper into the 
tunnel.
When you get the scroll back,
bring it to me, first!
Absolutely do not read the scroll!

original:
Our recipe!
...I mean, scroll.
...I guess we've been found out.
Yup, this is a cooking recipe!
It was a very important item!
Thank you for getting it back!
Please go and tell Karatenmon
that I got the scroll back!
translation:
Our recipe!
...I mean, scroll.
...I guess we've been found out.
Yup, this is a cooking recipe!
It was a very important item!
Thank you for getting it back!
Please go and tell Karatenmon
that I got the scroll back!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Training Recipe
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Training Recipe

original:
I'm sure Karatenmon'll be
relieved!
Quickly, go tell Karatenmon that
I've got the scroll back!
translation:
I'm sure Karatenmon'll be
relieved!
Quickly, go tell Karatenmon that
I've got the scroll back!

original:
Hoooh hoh hoh.

With this recipe, I'll be the best
chef in the entire world!
What? You didn't know??
This is a cooking recipe!
It's a super delicious recipe, too!

Those children put all their heart
into creating this recipe...
And I went and snatched it away
from them! It's my hobby!
If you want it...
You'll have to defeat me!
translation:
Hoooh hoh hoh.

With this recipe, I'll be the best
chef in the entire world!
What? You didn't know??
This is a cooking recipe!
It's a super delicious recipe, too!

Those children put all their heart
into creating this recipe...
And I went and snatched it away
from them! It's my hobby!
If you want it...
You'll have to defeat me!

original:
No! I lost! All the trouble I went 
through to get this... wasted!
translation:
No! I lost! All the trouble I went 
through to get this... wasted!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Training Recipe
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Training Recipe

original:
I'll have to find a new recipe, again!

This time, it'll be even more 
amazing and incredible!
translation:
I'll have to find a new recipe, again!

This time, it'll be even more 
amazing and incredible!

original:
^P...
Something terrible has happened...!
Yesterday, Gigimon and Puttmon 
got into an argument...
They disagreed on who was 
stronger...
So they decided to go to Angler 
Tunnel to compete!
Please stop their quarrel and
convince them to come back!
I'm counting on you!
translation:
^P...
Something terrible has happened...!
Yesterday, Gigimon and Puttmon 
got into an argument...
They disagreed on who was 
stronger...
So they decided to go to Angler 
Tunnel to compete!
Please stop their quarrel and
convince them to come back!
I'm counting on you!
